item.title: wakatime, an automatic time tracker for programmers
item.description: Wakatime tracks your time if you’re a programmer. It does this by integrating into your favorite text editor (including vim) and your favorite source code maintainence system (including Github) and then matching time spent editing with checkins into your system. It collects stats behind the scenes and turns everything into a shiny dashboard. “Fitbit for programmers” is the tag line. That which is measured, improves. I don’t know if wakatime will improve your writing, or your coding, or your general state of mind.
